system.description: Fierce and brazen, these mages are always at war. The arms dealers of the world, their magic is completely focused on destruction and thus they seek to create bigger and better ways to blow things up. Passionate, wild and a bit chaotic, these mages like the mountains and underground spaces. If you are playing a Flame Mage be hot tempered, war-like, ready for battle, and consuming everything.

overview.base: Having mastered the basic techniques in this field of magic, you are able to cast more advanced @L[Category:Spells]{spells}. If you create any @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} @L[Category:Spells]{spells} of your own, they get added to this list. However, just because you "know" how to cast these spells, doesn't mean you are always prepared to. Although all @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes} grant their own elder sorcery and rotator spells, you may only have a maximum of 2 × (@L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} - 1) of these spells rotated into your spell list at any given time across all classes. @L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} refers to the number of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{ranks} you have in @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes}. During a @L[Core:Long Rest]{long rest}, you can "rotate" which spells you have prepared. The @L[Category:Rotator spells]{rotator spells} automatically available to you are @L[Ability:Bellows]{Bellows}, @L[Ability:Control and Resist Fire]{Control and Resist Fire}, @L[Ability:Crown of Flame]{Crown of Flame}, @L[Ability:Melting Grasp]{Melting Grasp}, and @L[Ability:Rupture Mark]{Rupture Mark}.
overview.proficient: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.
overview.fluent: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Elder Sorcery Creation]{Elder Sorcery Creation}, @L[Ability:Celestial Elder Sorcery Words]{Celestial Elder Sorcery Words}, and @L[Ability:Flame Elder Sorcery Words]{Flame Elder Sorcery Words}.

You may create 1 custom "rotator" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} using @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} words that you know using whatever @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} creation rules are dictated to you by your @L[Core:GM]{GM}. As with other rotators, this spell is not always available to you. You have to "rotate" into having it prepared. This spell may have a maximum number of words equal to your @L[Core:Leveling Up]{level}. Your @L[Core:GM]{GM} may allow you to "improvise" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} as well, using whatever rules they wish.
overview.proficient: You may now create 2 × (@L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} - 1) custom "rotator" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} where @L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} is the number of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{ranks} you have in @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes}.
overview.fluent: In addition to the spells that you crate, you can learn @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} additional spells from other @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} users. See @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} for more information.

value.variable: Creation cost is at least 1 @L[Core:MP]{MP} per @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of each word in the spell plus 3 × @L[Core:MP]{MP} of the spell itself.
Creation cost is at least 3 × @L[Core:HP]{HP} of the spell itself.

costs.materialCost: Creation cost is at least 3 × the material components of the spell itself.

overview.base: The next @L[Category:Spells]{spell} you cast that would deal @L[Core:Damage]{damage} is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, the next @L[Category:Spells]{spell} you cast is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted} again.

overview.base:
You know @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} 1 @L[Core:Celestial Elder Sorcery Words]{Celestial Elder Sorcery words}.
OP 1 Celestial @L[Core:Elder Sorcery Words]{Elder Sorcery Words}
OP Celestial Adjectives Celestial Adverbs Celestial Articles Celestial Conjunctions Celestial Nouns Celestial Prepositions Celestial Pronouns Celestial Verbs

big carefully one but cup for my be
bright here the or dagger in that begin
clean pretty so foot of this did

small torch tend
this wand use
overview.proficient: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P}).
overview.fluent: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F}).

overview.base: Your @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} increases by [[/damage 1d4[fire magic]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}. You also @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} @L[Damage:Fire]{fire damage}.

You know @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} 1 @L[Core:Flame Elder Sorcery Words]{Flame Elder Sorcery words}.
OP 1 Flame @L[Core:Elder Sorcery Words]{Elder Sorcery Words}
OP @L[Class:Flame Mage]{Flame Nouns} @L[Class:Flame Mage]{Flame Verbs}
1 ash crack
cinder damage
ember dry
flame glow
howl illuminate
light kindle
spark rush
tinder temper
warmth warm
overview.proficient: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P}).
overview.fluent: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F}).

overview.base: A small circle of smokeless fire circles above your head. You gain @L[Ability:Burning Touch]{Burning Touch} and @L[Ability:Inferno Aura]{Inferno Aura}.

results.hit: Deal [[/damage 1d6[fire magic]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.
results.critHit: Double the @L[Core:Damage]{damage dice} dealt by this @L[Category:Abilities]{ability}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.

results.fail: Deal [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.

results.hit: Target's next @L[Category:Conjured spells]{conjured spell} does not trigger @L[Category:Reaction abilities]{reactions}.
